name: Vault Dragon Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a suite of healthcare data software designed to digitally empower healthcare providers and patients. The company's software digitizes medical records and helps to generate customizable reports with a real-time syncing facility that complements financial reports and research, enabling clinics to streamline their workflow, in turn, providing efficient delivery of healthcare.
